alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 9:51PM MDT until July 11 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... West central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 1045 PM MDT. * At 951 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Silver City, or 11 miles north of Hill City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pactola Reservoir around 955 PM MDT. Johnson Siding around 1005 PM MDT. Hisega around 1010 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Black Hawk, Rockerville, Rapid City, Reptile Gardens, Bear Country, Rapid Valley, Black Gap, Hart Ranch and Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 51 and 66. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
